item.title: Review LEGO 60234 ~ People Pack Fun Fair
item.description: Minifigures are one of the things my daughter loves the most about LEGO. She uses minifigures to create real world, and fantastic scenes; looking at her playing with minifigures is one of the best thing. When we visit our local LEGO store, we cannot exit before having a stop at the “Build a Mini” tower - and I’ve to admit - that’s also because of me ðŸ˜… Having been locked down for almost 2 months now, we didn’t have the opportunity to visit our local LEGO store recently; so when I stumbled upon LEGO People Pack Fun Fair ~ LEGO 60234 on Amazon, and it had a 28% discount, I couldn’t resist from buying it.
